description.Time_spent_Alone: How many hours a person prefers to spend alone.
description.Stage_fear: Fear of speaking or performing in front of people (Yes/No).
description.Social_event_attendance: How often a person attends social events.
description.Going_outside: How frequently a person goes outside.

insight_1: People who experience stage fear and feel drained after socializing showed introvert tendencies as high as 100.0%, while the opposite pattern dropped to just 5.5%.
insight_2: When someone spends a lot of time alone and rarely goes outside, introversion reached 92.0%, compared to only 5.6% in more outgoing lifestyles.
insight_3: A smaller friend circle combined with lower social event attendance pushed introversion up to 100.0%, while highly social individuals showed only 0.0% introvert patterns.
